content.text:
# 1985 Australian Film Institute Awards

The 27th Australian Film Institute Awards were awards held by the Australian Film Institute to celebrate the best of Australian films of 1985.
Feature film
{| class="wikitable" style="width="
| valign="top" width="50%" |

**A Street to Die – Bill Bennett
**Fran – David Rapsey
**Unfinished Business – Rebel Penfold-Russell

**Bob Ellis – Unfinished Business
